msg: Session started, recovering from crash, checking hive for tasks

Clarified: hive_comms_spec = API layer for bees, ADR-004 = G-Drive structure, Discord = notifications. Three separate specs.

Created specs/README.md (organization) and SCALING-001-Growth-Governance.md (5-level scaling roadmap)
Context recovery - continuing from crash. Resuming git setup tasks.
Pushed merged main branch, deleted master branch (local+remote), set main as default
Branch protection requires GitHub Pro or public repo - private repos on free tier cannot use branch protection
Made repo public per Q33N approval
Branch protection enabled: PRs required, stale reviews dismissed, no direct pushes to main
Created .github/REPO-CONFIG.md documenting repo visibility, branch protection, contribution workflow
Updated README.md with Repository section linking to REPO-CONFIG.md
Captured platform architecture paths input - Supabase vs Keycloak vs Matrix decision
Created ADR-006-Hive-Control-Plane.md - full spec for coordination server with dual-mode (API + file-based) comms
Added Section 16 to BOK-REVIEW-001: Spec Feedback & Joint Prioritization - judges provide priority feedback on specs, tribunal jointly prioritizes
Applied Gemini feedback to ADR-006: file-driven as first-class citizen, LLM conflict resolution with Ollama support, API key management, resolved open questions
Created SPEC-Tribunal-Onboarding - instructions for any bee to become a Q33N judge (INVEST criteria, voting rules, API usage)
Created SPEC-Tribunal-SDK - Python SDK for tribunal operations (get_pr, submit_verdict, inline and file-based fallback)
Claimed task to scaffold Next.js frontend for Human Dashboard
pnpm not available, using npm instead
Frontend scaffolded successfully - Next.js 16.1.6 with TypeScript, Tailwind, App Router. Dev server verified working.
